meanings.sent1: The soup was so digestible that even a baby could eat it.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a diet of easily digestible foods after the surgery.
meanings.sent3: I find math problems more digestible than a plate of broccoli.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was as clear and digestible as a glass of water.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation was so digestible that even the students who struggled understood.

meanings.sent1: The digestible instructions made assembling the furniture a breeze.
meanings.sent2: The digestible language in the book made it a favorite among young readers.
meanings.sent3: I wish all my textbooks were as digestible as this one!
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was as digestible as a piece of cake.
meanings.sent5: The concept became more digestible once she used real-life examples in her lecture.
